thread.title: The Chinese people given enormous amounts of food - by their parents
thread.title_full: The Chinese people given enormous amounts of food - by their parents - BBC News

author: BBC
title: The Chinese people given enormous amounts of food - by their parents
text:
He became known as "pancake uncle". A Chinese man was spotted taking 15kg of homemade pancakes out of his overweight suitcase at an airport. He'd been given the massive haul of food by his parents.
When the story reached China's Weibo social network, hashtags such as "Luggage Filled With Love" took off. Thousands shared the edible goods their parents sent them off with after trips home for the Chinese New Year holiday.
Some posters showed off ludicrous quantities and the trend raised a universal question: what' s so special about food from home?
Video Journalist: Natalia Zuo
You can follow BBC Trending on Twitter @BBCtrending , and find us on Facebook . All our stories are at bbc.com/trending .
